data.text: @Cynergistic1 @YouTube True enough. And virology is definitely a tight specialization (I studied it in college).

@Cynergistic1 @YouTube There is something to be said for the argument that someone who's studied a subject, made it their life's work, etc is probably going to be better than a layman no matter how smart.
@Cynergistic1 @YouTube I can see wanting them to do better broader testing. And if you have health concerns you shouldn't take it. But that's true of all medications.
@Cynergistic1 @YouTube You know they have been working on that type of vaccine for 20+ years right? That it's designed to be quicker and easier to add the piece of the virus to.
